In the four corners of the maze are power-pills and if eaten allow you to chase and eat the ghosts for a limited time. One unique feature is the ability to enter the area the Ghosts re-spawn to eat them after a power-pill has been eaten.
title: Cruncher

description: Death River is a top view horizontal shooter that scrolls constantly from right to left, and your mission in your boat is to rescue hostages. To get a hostage you must blast the other boats on the river and occasionally a hostage will appear in the water and you attempt to collect him. Your boat can carry five hostages at a time, anymore and you will capsize but there are jetties (shown by the letter H) on the sides and when touched will empty your boat. A fuel gauge decreases as you drive down the river but fuel can be collected on the sides. Mines in the water need avoiding and if you touch a mine, a boat, the sides of the river, run out of fuel or capsize then you lose one of three lives.
title: Death River

description: Dingbat is a side view single screen shooter where you must fly around the screen with your jet-pack blasting the enemy over various levels. You can move left or right, but to go up or down you must use your boosters and gravity. After so many destroyed enemy they drop an item and you must collect a certain number to move to the next level. Touching an enemy or using your boosters decreases your energy and if it runs out or you hit the ground then you lose one of five lives. A destroyed enemy will also drop a B which increases your energy.
title: Dingbat

description: Dizasterblaster is a top view vertical shooter where you have to blast waves of alien ships over various levels, moving your spacecraft left or right. To complete a level you have to avoid or blast the aliens as a clock counts down and when it reaches zero you move to the next level. If you touch an alien ship or its weapon then you lose one of nine lives. Once you have lost all your lives you can choose any one of the levels you have completed or the last level you played on.
title: Dizasterblaster

description: Froggy is a top view single screen game based on the arcade game Frogger, where you have to get from the bottom of the screen to the top. The screen is split into two parts, a road and a river with a resting place inbetween and you have to cross these within 30 seconds or you lose one of three lives. The road has traffic driving across the screen in both directions and if you touch a vehicle then you lose a life. Once you cross the road, you then have to cross a river with logs moving across the screen in both directions and if you hit the water then you lose a life. At the top of the screen are four gaps which you have to place your frog in one of them before attempting to get another frog up the screen. If you miss a gap or place a frog in an occupied one then you lose a life.

sample_screenshots.caption: Made it to the other side

title: Froggy

description: Fury is a single screen platform game connected by ladders, where you play the role of a survivor from a thermonuclear war forced to live underground in a network of tunnels. Unfortunately you share the tunnels with Mutants who are out to kill you so you must fight back with a limited supply of dynamite. To kill a Mutant you place the dynamite on the platform and move to a safe distance and part of the platform will disappear. Any Mutants that fall in the gap will die and once all Mutants are killed then you move to the next screen. If you are trapped by gaps then you can place new platforms and if you touch any Mutants you lose one of five lives. Before the start of the game you can select your skill level (1-5) with one being the easiest.
title: Fury

description: Galaxions is inspired by the arcade game Galaga where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen moving left or right, blasting aliens above. The aliens fly onto the screen in various waves firing their lasers at you before sitting in formation, and once all the aliens are in formation, various aliens will swoop down firing their lasers. If you touch an alien or its laser then you lose one of four lives and once all the aliens are destroyed then you move to the next level.
title: Galaxions

description: Goldrush is a top view single screen shooter inspired by the arcade game Asteroids where you have to destroy an asteroid over various levels. When you hit the asteroid it breaks into smaller pieces which also need blasting and you have to destroy every piece before the screen, which is decreasing, closes. If you touch an asteroid then you lose one of six lives but you can thrust forwards to avoid them but cannot stop, just change direction. The further you progress, the more large asteroids start on the screen.
title: Goldrush

description: Golf allows you to have either a nine or eighteen round of golf viewed from above with each hole on a single screen. Each hole has all the features of golf with a fairway, rough, bunkers, trees and water hazards. There are no clubs to choose from so to take a shot you adjust a power bar before a black box with a white dot inside appears, to allow you to choose your direction from 1 to 360 degrees. There is also no putting, you just have to get the ball in a large hole. Once the ball is holed, it is on to the next hole. One or two players can compete against each other taking it in turns to take a shot
title: Golf

description: You are Jesse James and you are hunting Outlaws in a frontier town to make yourself $10 for every Outlaw killed to make your fortune. The game is a flick-screen game viewed from a 3rd person perspective behind Jesse with the town in the back of the screen. The town is made up of five screens and arrows pointing to the left and the right on the top of the screen flash to show which direction to move to the next Outlaw. Once you find an Outlaw you must face him in line and move your gun up or down to kill him before he kills you. Your gun has seven bullets in it and to get more bullets for your gun you receive one bullet for shooting an outlaw or you move to the far right screen and reload all seven by touching your horse. If you are shot by an Outlaw then you lose one of three lives but your gun is reloaded. After losing all three lives it is game over but your total money received stays for the next games.

sample_screenshots.caption: Getting more bullets from your horse

title: Gunslinger

description: GWNN is a top view horizontal shooter where you fly left to right, or right to left over an alien base to complete six missions to finally destroy the base. Each mission has you attempting to complete a task which are, rescue scientists, destroy a generator, pick up autofire, destroy an ammo dump, fuel up and destroy the actual base. The items that need collecting are represented by letters and just need flying over to collect. As you fly you will encounter aliens moving across the screen as well as raised obstacles and touching any of these decrease a energy gauge. If this empties then you lose one of three lives but collecting the letter E increases it. If you complete a mission then you move to a bonus stage which sees you collecting bonus points.
title: GWNN

description:
You are Digger Doc, an archaeologist who has internationally become famous after discovering an ancient tomb with vaults filled with treasure contained in chests. Problem now is to remove the chests while avoiding the various guardians who will stop anyone attempting to remove the treasure. The game is a single screen maze game where you have to get a chest on each screen to an exit portal but the chests can only be pushed so a route needs to be planned. Doc though is able to move off the screen and appear on the other side of the screen. As you push the chest, there are various Guardians moving around the screen as well as obstacles like snakes, and if they are touched then a energy bar decreases and if it empties then a life is lost. Gold bars and diamonds can be collected for bonus points and certain items can be collected to increase your energy.

Before the start of the game there are various options that can be adjusted and they are, Number of Lives (1-9), Speed of the Game (1-10), Maze Number (1-20), Number of Ghosts (0-7), Strength of Ghosts (0-9), and Power of Ignots (0-99). Two players can play and each player takes it in turns to play when the other player has died.
title: Heebie Jeebies

description: Hoppit is a Frogger clone that sees you attempt to get a frog home to his lily pad at the top of the screen in this top view single screen game. There are two sections that have to be crossed safely and they are a road and a river with various obstacles to be avoided. The road has traffic moving across the screen from right to left, and left to right and the river has logs and turtles moving in the same directions. You have 30 seconds to get your frog on a lily pad or you lose one of three lives by avoiding the traffic or riding on the logs and turtles. Hitting traffic, touching the water or missing a lily pad also loses a life. There are three skill levels (1-3) with one having less traffic and more logs and turtles.
title: Hoppit

description: Your mission is to enter a network of caverns on a remote planet and rescue the survivors from the crashed spaceship, Colonial Expedition 901. You control a rescue vessel dispatched from your Mothership and search the caverns over various levels. The game is a horizontal scrolling shooter with the screen scrolling to the left or right when you move your vessel. Although you are able to hit the sides of the caverns, you must avoid gates, or shoot or avoid the various obstacles like meteors and other objects, as touching these drain your shield gauge. Once your shield gauge has emptied then you lose one of three lives. To progress to the next level you must collect a certain amount of survivors before returning back to the Mothership to fill your shield gauge and on to the next level.
title: Into the Deep

description: Invaders is inspired by the arcade game Space Invaders and sees the Earth once again invaded by an alien force in this side view single screen shooter. You control a laser platform at the bottom of the screen that can move left or right, and you must blast a wave of aliens in formation above you descending slowly. The aliens move across the screen and when they reach the edge of the screen they move down one place while dropping bombs to destroy yourself. A large alien ship occasionally appears at the top of the screen and can change direction, but if shot gives you bonus points. In between you and the aliens are four large shields but these slowly disappear as you or the aliens hit them but do provide some cover. If you destroy all the aliens then you move to the next wave but get hit by a bomb or allow the aliens to land at the bottom of the screen and you lose one of three lives. Two players can play and each player takes it in turns to play when the other player is killed.
title: Invaders

description: Invasion 2000 A.D. is inspired by the arcade game Space Invaders and sees the Earth once again invaded by an alien force in this side view single screen shooter. You control a craft at the bottom of the screen that can move left or right, and you must blast a wave of aliens in formation above you descending slowly. The aliens move across the screen and when they reach the edge of the screen they move down one place while dropping bombs to destroy yourself. A mothership occasionally appears at the top of the screen and if shot gives you bonus points. In between you and the aliens are four large shields but these slowly disappear as you or the aliens hit them but do provide some cover. If you destroy all the aliens then you move to the next wave but get hit by a bomb or allow the aliens to land at the bottom of the screen and you lose one of three lives.
title: Invasion 2000 A.D.

description: Jetbrix is a single screen side view shooter where you control a spaceman with a jet-pack who has to make a hole through the bottom of a brick wall on the bottom of the screen over various levels. To do this, you have to collect spinners and bombs, then drop them on to the wall while avoiding falling bricks which settle on the wall and makes the wall higher. The spinners can remove the bricks but cannot remove the bottom row but the bombs can remove the bottom row of bricks. You are armed with a laser to shoot the falling bricks but if you touch one then you lose one of seven lives. You can also move on to the next level if you survive a level when a clock reaches zero.
title: Jetbrix

description: In this single screen platform game, you play the role of a kangaroo called Joey who must move around the screen to collect all the boomerangs to move to the next level. Connecting the various platforms are ladders but Joey can fall through the gaps from any height without being hurt. Moving around the screen are creatures that can be avoided or jumped over and if you touch one then you lose one of three lives and you have to start the level again. A clock counts down and you also lose a life if you haven't completed the level when it reaches zero.
title: Joey

description: Karate King is a side view single screen beat 'em up in the same style as The Way of the Exploding Fist, as you must either try to beat the computer or another player. Using different joystick combinations, each player has various amounts of moves including punches, kicks and jumping and for every good hit the player gets a point. Once a player has three points then he has won the fight and moves on to the next opponent. A clock counts down and the winner of the fight is the one with the most points.
title: Karate King

description: Knock Out is a clone of the arcade game Breakout where you have to move a bat at the bottom of the screen, left or right to bounce a ball upwards. The idea is to remove all the bricks above by hitting them and once all have been removed then you attempt the same again. If the ball passes the bat then you lose one of three lives.
title: Knock Out

description: Lawn Tennis allows you to have a game of tennis against the computer or another player over five sets. The game is viewed from behind your player at an elevated angle. The normal of rules of tennis apply and the winner is the player who wins the best of five sets.
title: Lawn Tennis

description: Lazer 900 is a side view single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving it left or right blasting various waves of aliens above. The waves of aliens move in various formations and drop bombs to destroy you and if you are hit by one then you lose one of three lives. After completing four waves you repeat them again but much harder.
title: Lazer 900

description: You are mankinds only hope as huge Motherships and their fighters from the Anconian Fleet are poised to attack and you must destroy them all. In this top view horizontal scrolling shooter you must fly your spacecraft over the surface of each Mothership, blasting the enemy fighters before attempting to destroy their reactor. As you fly you must avoid or blast the fighters, gun placements, and avoid any obstacles and if you touch any or are shot then you lose one of five lives. At the end of your run over the Mothership is the reactor and you must destroy the force fields before destroying a huge ship protecting the reactor. once destroyed you move on to the next Mothership.
title: Liberator

description: The 5:15 to Victoria is in trouble when the guard rushes through the carriages screaming that the train is out of control down a steep incline with the Driver not responding on the intercom. You are "Loco" Lionel, leading Hollywood stuntman who has taken the task of climbing on to the roof and attempting to get to the driver. There are 14 carriages, each on a single screen, and you must get from the right of the screen to the left avoiding all obstacles by jumping or ducking before a timer reaches zero. If you touch an obstacle or fall through the gap between carriages, then you lose one of six lives.
title: Loco-Coco

description:
Mail Trail is a top view single screen game where you have to deliver mail to a house within 28 days avoiding various obstacles and vehicles. Starting on the left of the screen you must reach a chosen house in an fenced off estate on the right of the screen. You first must move around trees before attempting to cross two railway tracks with speeding trains moving up and down the screen. Once past the railway lines, you have to cross two rivers by jumping on moving boats to get to the other side. You are now outside the estate with one entrance and inside is the house (coloured purple) but there are vehicles driving around the streets.

Once the mail is delivered, you have to get back to the left of the screen to pick up more mail and another 28 days to deliver it. If you touch a vehicle, fall in the river or run out of days then you lose one of three lives but there are Bumper Boosters in the estate to give you a few seconds of invunerability.
title: Mail Trail

description: Manic Death Chase is a platform maze game where the screen scrolls left or right when you move your hero. You play the role of Pat who for reasons unknown is trapped in an underground cavern and has to attempt to escape. As you move along the platforms, you will encounter giant spiders or spikes and if you touch any then you lose one of three lives. There are also dead-ends but you are able to move back on yourself and jump to higher platforms.
title: Manic Death Chase

description:
10 Computer Hits 3 is a collection of ten games that contains the following games:

  • Invasion 2000 AD
  • Skramble
  • Death Race 16
  • Galaxions
  • Circus
  • Space Pilot
  • Robin to the Rescue
  • Psychedelia
  • Space Freaks
  • World Cup
title: 10 Computer Hits 3

description:
10 Computer Hits 4 is a collection of ten games (plus two free ones) that contains the following games:

  • Dirty Den
  • Demolition
  • Berks
  • Autozone
  • Hyperforce
  • Berks 2 (Major Blink)
  • Atlantis
  • Tazz
  • Starburst
  • Berks 3

The two free games included are:

  • Lazerzone
  • Timeslip
title: 10 Computer Hits 4

description: 2048 is a puzzle game where the idea is to make the number 2048 appear on a 4 x 4 grid. Starting with two number two's, you must move the numbers to make other number two's appear and when they touch then they double to make four. Moving the numbers make other numbers appear and if the same number touches then they double as well. You have to keep doubling the numbers until you make 2048 without filling the grid and you are unable to move any more numbers.

Mega Zap is a side view single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft, moving left or right, at the bottom of the screen blasting various aliens and meteors above over various levels. Each level has a set type of alien or meteor and these move in various waves like moving across the screen in formation, breaking from formation or just falling down the screen. The aliens will drop bombs and if you hit an alien, bomb or meteor then you lose one of three lives.
title: Mega Zap

description: Inspired by the arcade game Asteroids, Meteorites is a top view single screen shooter where you start in the middle of the screen blasting meteors moving in various directions around the screen. You turn in a 360 degree direction and using thrust moves you forward a short distance. When you hit a meteor it splits into smaller pieces and when these pieces are shot they disappear. If you are hit by a meteor then you lose one of three lives.
title: Meteorite

description: Mount Vesuvius is erupting and the sheherds and farmers that live in the houses beside the slopes need rescuing. You have been chosen to take your helicopter in this side view horizontal scrolling game where the screen scrolls when you move, and fly to all the houses and rescue as many people as you can. You start beside a cable car station and as you take off and fly you look for houses on the ground and land besides them to increase your passenger counter. You can only carry five people so once full you fly back to the station to drop them off and also re-fuel because as you fly your fuel decreases and when it is empty it is game over. You are required to pick up a minimum amount of people to carry on with the game and there is a set number of inhabitants that need rescuing to complete the game.
title: Mount Vesuvius

description:
The remote outpost on the edge of the Empire, Netrun 2000 is under attack from alien invaders, hellbent on taking over the Empire. The outpost consists of a barrier containing two gun emplacements on either side that are controlled together and fire outwards to blast any enemy that appear. The game is a single screen shooter where you move the guns in the centre of the screen, up or down to blast aliens that appear from either side of the screen over various levels.

As you blast the aliens that move around the screen, others will appear and head straight to the barrier, and when hit loses energy, and when your energy is gone then you lose one of five lives. Your guns are also able to jump forward for a brief time to clear any aliens that move up or down the barrier. To clear a level you have to destroy all the aliens on screen but occasionally an object appears on the side of the screen and if shot moves you to the next level.
title: Netrun 2000

description:
Number Builder is an single screen educational platformer to help you improve your maths over twelve levels. You play the role of a builder who must move around a building site, climbing ladders, looking for sums to make a target number. You are given a starting number and you must pick up sums to add or subtract from that number to make the target number. Each level is split into three different target numbers and each must be completed before a bucket is lifted to the top of the screen. Once a level is completed you get paid money before attempting the next level.

Before you play the game you can select your starting level as well as your builder who vary in different speeds. There is also a Self Test where you choose a level of difficulty and attempt to give the correct answers to ten sums before receiving a score.
title: Number Builder

description: Olympic Skier as the name suggests allows you to control a skier down a mountainside viewed in front of the skier at a high elevated angle. The game is split into three sections which are Downhill, Target Jump and Slalom, and all three section must be completed in one go before a timer runs out. Downhill has you skiing down the mountain, moving left or right, avoiding obstacles like trees on the side of the screen, rocks, bumps and logs and when touched causes you to crash and lose valuable seconds. You can accelerate your skier and ice patches allow you to go faster, but hitting ski's slows you down. Target Jump has you waggling left and right to pick up speed before jumping of a ramp. You move your skier up or down to land as close to the centre of a target. To finish the game you now attempt Slalom where you must go through gates made up of flags.
title: Olympic Skier

description: The Russians have built Laser Defence Units in three strategic locations on the moon, to protect the ultimate weapon which will aid in their attempt at World Domination. You have been sent by NATO to fly over the surface of the moon to destroy the Units in your spacecraft so that a special force can come and destroy the weapon. The game is a side view horizontal shooter where the screen scrolls right or left when you move. In each location are three units and you have to keep blasting them but as you blast, repair crews will repair where you have shot and each unit has a gauge at the top of the screen which decreases when you blast them. Protecting the units are low flying satellites and other objects and if you touch any satellites, objects or the units then you lose one of three lives. As you fly around and shoot, two gauges, fuel and ammo decrease but more can be collected if you land on a supply dump.
title: Operation Red Moon

description:
Things aren't going well for Luigi, production at the bakery has halted so he is unable to make his Pizza on the night shift. The only solution is to call in Pizza Pete to break into the bakery and make the pizza himself. The game is a single screen platformer inspired by the arcade game BurgerTime where you have to run along platforms and climb ladders to make the pizza. Each screen is made up of four rows of platforms and on each level is an ingredient, the base, cheese, tomato and salami. Controlling Pete you run over the ingredients which pushes them down to the next row and pushes any other ingredients below, downwards.

As you make the pizza there are various items moving around the screen like sausages, spoons, bottles and onions, and if you touch one then you lose one of five lives. Pete is able to make his hat bigger and this makes him immune for a short period shown by a clock on the bottom of the screen. Pete only has four hats but can get more when his assistant, Sophia runs across the screen and is touched. Sometimes Sophia won't give you a hat and you can't get another one if your hat is big.

sample_screenshots.caption: Next level and a bottle has joined us

title: Pizza Pete.

description: Quick Draw is a single screen two player shooter where each player stands on either side of the screen as cowboys, and have to try to shoot the other player dead. Both players can move up or down, and in between on the screen are cactus and a wagon that scrolls up the screen. The winner is the player who shoots the other player dead five times.
title: Quick Draw

description: You play the role of Raffles the Master burglar and your aim is to enter five towns and rob five mansions in each. Your first task, in this top view single screen, is to drive in the town from your hotel to one of the mansions, avoiding the police (a bouncing ball) to reach a mansion. Once you reach the mansion the view switches to a high elevated angle and the screen scrolls left or right when you move as you search for the safe. As you search you will encounter security guards (once again, bouncing balls) and these need avoiding because if you touch one as well as any police, you lose one of three lives. When you reach the safe, you have to touch it before leaving the room it is in for it to explode. You collect what's in the safe before making your way back to the start of the mansion. If successful, you now drive around the town again to get to the next mansion.
title: Raffles

description: Evil Dr Smenk has attacked and conquered the planet Daikon and made all the inhabitants slaves and transported them to Zincros, a penal colony. You have managed to escape and have decided to take back the planet by entering the city of Daikon, via underground caverns and destroy nuclear pods and weapons. Raider is a side view horizontal shooter where the screen scrolls constantly from left to right. You move you spacecraft up or down and you have a cannon and bombs to help you in your mission. You must avoid the sides of the caverns as well as any pods or weapons you encounter, and if you touch any then you lose one of three lives. As you fly, your fuel gauge decreases but shooting or bombing pods increases it.
title: Raider

description:
Inspired by Arkanoid, Reflex is a single screen game where you have to remove bricks on various screens by bouncing a ball with two paddles. As well as the difference of playing with two paddles that move in the opposite direction, you play horizontally instead of vertically. With bricks that take one hit to remove, there are bricks that require multiple hits, bricks that can't be removed, speed bricks which speed up the ball, stun ray bricks which fires a laser every five seconds, and blocker bricks which can block the path of the bat.

Certain bricks when removed also leave behind a star and when hit which gives you a bonus or items to help like extra points, a wall behind the bat, magnetic bat, 3 missiles or an extra life. If the ball goes past either bat then you lose one of three lives. There is also a time limit on each screen and you lose a life if a timer gauge empties.
title: Reflex

description: Maid Marion has been captured and held in Nottingham Castle by the evil Sheriff and as Robin Hood, you must attempt to navigate through the castle and rescue her. The game is a single screen platformer where you have to move around each screen to collect all the flashing keys to move to the next screen. Ropes can be climbed to get to higher parts on the screen. There are many obstacles to avoid which are gaps in the walls, guards with spears, arrows flying across the screen and falling objects. If you touch any object or fall into a gap then you lose one of three lives.
title: Robin to the Rescue

description: You are a Knight, and your quest in this flick-screen platform game is to explore a castle and collect 15 shields to get to the exit and collect the Sword of Power within a time limit. As well as platforms to get around, doors must be used to get to other parts of the castle. There are various obstacles that need avoiding like water, drills and platforms that move left and right and if you touch any of the obstacles then you lose one of three lives. Once you retrieve all the shields and get the Sword of Power, you can attempt to complete the game again to receive more points.
title: Robo Knight

description:
You play the role of a young man bored with life so has decided to go out in the world to make his fortune. As a farewell gift, his Father gave him a magic carpet to ride the land, but also gave a warning about an evil genie in one of the castles. Realising that great power would come his way if the genie was defeated, the young man decided to explore the land to get treasures but also to get experience and magic to face the genie in one final showdown.

Rug Rider is a side view single screen game where you must fly around the screen on your magic carpet to collect keys to unlock the treasure over various locations. Before you play a screen, you are presented with a map that has various locations and you are able to select any one to play. As you fly around each screen, there are various creatures that fly around and these must be avoided or shot with limited amounts of magic. If you touch a creature then you lose one of five lives but you keep any keys collected. Hitting platforms or objects too hard also loses you a life. Up to four players can play but each player has to wait for the other players to play a full game before having a turn.
title: Rug Rider

description: Sea Strike is a side view horizontal shooter where the screen scrolls left or right when you move, and your mission in your Sea Harrier Jet is to bomb and destroy a convoy. You start hovering above a re-fuelling ship and you must fly across the sea searching for ships and bombing them but you must avoid or shoot helicopters that fly across the screen. As you fly and use your ammo, ammo and fuel gauges decrease but you can land on a re-fuelling ship to top these up. If you are shot by a helicopter, crash into a helicopter or touch the water then you lose one of three lives. On the screen is a scanner showing the locations of the ships that need to be bombed.
title: Sea Strike

description: Based on the aracde game Space Invaders, Shoot-It is a side view single screen shooter where you control a craft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, to blast aliens above. The aliens are in formation and move across the screen from left to right, and when they reach the end of the screen, they then move left but one place lower. As you blast the aliens, they drop bombs which need avoiding and if you are hit then you lose one of three lives. To help protect you, there are four shields between you and the aliens but these can be shot and removed piece by piece from the aliens bombs and your shots. If you allow the aliens to land on the surface then you lose a life also. There are five skill levels (1-5) to choose from with one being the slowest.
title: Shoot-It

description: Skelby the Droid is trapped in a building made up of top view single screen rooms, and to leave each room Skelby has to catch all the Squirmers on the screen to move to the next room. Skelby can move in four directions but once he is moving then he is unable to stop but the game can be paused to stop Skelby. As a Squirmer is collected then this leaves behind a gravestone and if Skelby touches a gravestone or a wall then he loses one of four lives. As the game progresses more walls are placed in each room to avoid.

sample_screenshots.caption: Dead Squirmers have left behind gravestones

title: Skelby

description: Small Jones is a top view maze game where the screen scolls up or down when you move as you control a treasure digger looking for treasures like gold and sceptres. As you move around the maze you will encounter many creatures like snakes and these can be shot with your gun but you can only fire horizontally. You are also armed with three bombs which kill everything in the surrounding area. Other obstacles encountered are holes which produce the creatures and if you touch a hole or a creature then you lose one of three lives. The maze is split into various parts and separating each part is a door which requires a key to open it.
title: Small Jones

description: On a research base, the geologists are being abducted while they work by aliens, and in this side view single screen shooter, it is your mission to destroy all the aliens while saving the scientists. You control a craft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, and you blast upwards to destroy various waves of aliens as they move around the screen dropping bombs. To save a scientist, you must shoot the alien that is holding him to save him. Other aliens appear on the surface and move across the screen and these need shooting as well because if you touch one or are hit by a bomb then you lose one of six lives.
title: Fiends

description: You are Captain Black and after a routine space patrol, your crew and spacecraft have been pulled through a black hole and now find yourself in some distant Galaxy. In this side view single screen shooter, you must protect yourself, crew and craft by blasting Space Freeks who are determined to destroy you over various levels. You move your craft, left or right, on the bottom of the screen and blast waves of Freeks as they move around the screen above you. The Freeks will drop bombs and these have to be avoided as well as any freeks that move to the bottom of the screen, and if you are hit then you lose one of five lives but you do move to the next level.
title: Space Freeks

description: Splitz is a single screen platformer where the aim is to build the next level by collecting tokens. The screen is split into two vertical halves and you play in one of the halves moving around platforms and climbing ladders. The tokens needed are scattered around the screen and you can only collect one at a time and once you have a token you must place it into a pipe. The token moves through the pipe and part of the next level appears in the other half of the screen. There are two types of creatures that move around the screen with one fatal to touch and you lose one of eight lives when touched, and one that takes the token you are holding and places it elsewhere on the screen. The next level must be built before a clock runs down to zero and once completed you play the new level trying to build another one.
title: Splitz

description:
A Planet Ship has entered the Solar System relatively unnoticed until astronomers on Earth discovered it was on a collision course with our planet. With no radio contact, you, the Captain of the ship Starlite 1 has been sent to the ship to explore and stop it at all costs. Using your Remote Controlled Skimmer (RCS), you have discovered a vast ship full of 1024 rooms and pieces of a Self Destruct Mechanism scattered around, as well various security features in place. You have decided to collect the pieces of the Mechanism, enter the correct code before getting your RCS to the exit before the ship explodes.

Starlite 1 is a flick screen maze game where you control the RCS to find the pieces of the Mechanism while avoiding the security like bouncing balls, lasers and blocks, and if touched lose part of an energy gauge and when it runs out then it is game over. Once pieces of the Mechanism have been collected, they are shown on the right of the screen. A map of the ship can be displayed as well any rooms with parts in but this drains energy when used.

sample_screenshots.caption: Part of the Self Destruct Mechanism

title: Starlite 1

description: Starter Chess allows you to play a game of chess against the computer where you type in the co-ordinates to move your pieces. All the rules are present and the winner is the player that makes the other players King unable to move without being taken. You also have the option to play yourself.
title: Starter Chess

description: Tank Attack is a two player top view single screen shooter, where both players control a tank, moving left or right, at the top and bottom of the screen and try to kill each other. In between the tanks are various obstacles like walls and posts, and the posts can be removed by constantly shooting them. The winner is the player who kills the other player three times.
title: Tank Attack

description: You are the commander of a submarine and it's your mission to fire torpedoes and destroy a convoy of ships in this single screen 1st person game. You look through your periscope and when any ship comes into view you fire your torpedoes but once the torpedoes have been fired you can't fire anymore until they hit or miss the ships. As you attempt to destroy ships, an anti-aircraft alert will occasionally start flashing meaning a plane will soon fly across the screen. You must dive under the water and wait until you think it safe to re-surface. If you see the plane then that means the plane has spotted you and it is game over. There are five skill levels (1-5) to choose from with one being the easiest.
title: Torpedo Alley

description:
Your base is due to be attacked by several convoys of ships so you have been tasked to command a submarine and look for the convoys and destroy them. Starting from your base on a single screen map, you must sail around the surrounding waters looking for convoys either on the surface of the water or underneath. You are able to steer your sub as well as control the speed listening to your echo sounder. For a look at your location you can use your periscope to visually check but you can only be so deep under water before you lose the periscope if in use.

You only have a limited supply of fuel and torpedoes but a return back to base replenishes these. Sailing underwater decreases your oxygen levels but surfacing increases it as running out of oxygen means game over. Leaving or entering your base requires moving through an area full of mines and this is viewed from the side with the screen scrolling left to right. You must move up or down to avoid the mines or it is game over. Once you encounter a convoy, you can use your periscope to help you aim and fire your torpedoes. The ships will fire back and also planes escorting the ships will try to destroy you so diving allows you to avoid being hit but you get less points for hitting ships. If you hit a ships ammo store then it is an instant sinking but anywhere else only damages the ship.

sample_screenshots.caption: Map of your base and surrounding waters

title: Torpedorun

description: Treasure Hunter is a text adventure where your aim is to explore a land looking for and collecting as much treasure as you can. You must solve various problems as well as encounter various creatures. The screen has text which describes your locations and you use the keyboard to type in commands to interact with your surroundings.
title: Treasure Hunter

description: You are destined to spend your days running within drains and pipes in an labyrinth of an unknown empire so you have decided to escape. The labyrinth is made up of various levels, each one viewed from the side with the screen scrolling in multiple directions when you move, and you must collect all the jewels to move to the next level before a strict time limit reaches zero. As you run around the pipes you use up energy shown by a gauge, and if you touch any creature then this decreases it even further. You are armed with a gun to shoot the creatures but the ammo is limited but extra ammo and energy can be found. Gates can block your path but keys are scattered around each level to collect and open the gates, with lifts to help you get to higher parts of the labyrinth. If your energy runs out or the clock reaches zero then you lose one of four lives.
title: Tube Runner

description:
UXB is a single screen game where you play the role of Captain Dar-es UXB, a bomb disposal expert who has been called to save the Caverns of Time. Gaterns have placed bombs in each cavern because they weren't given immortality by Lord of the Touchstone and vow to destroy them all. You must move around the screen, touching four of the bombs to defuse them before each bomb's timers run out, then you touch a Hour Gate to move to the next cavern. If you defuse more than four bombs then the Hour Gate's won't open and you have to sacrifice a life to move to the next cavern.

The screens are made up of touchstones and when you move from a touchstone, it disappears so a path needs to be planned so you are not trapped with no where to move. You can though, hold down the fire button to move a row of touchstones left or right, but anything touching the edge of the screen disappears. As you move and defuse bombs, there are also Qerims moving around and if touched then you lose a life. Time Spines are represented by Skull and Crossbones and also need avoiding but cherries collected give bonus points. You have five lives to start with but if you allow any bomb to explode then it is instant game over.

sample_screenshots.caption: Lets save the Caverns of Time

title: UXB

description: Under the water is a collection of submarines called The Wolfpack and they destroy all ships that stray into their area. You are the commander of a destroyer and your job is to keep dropping bombs to destroy the subs. The game is a side view single screen game, and you control your ship, left or right, on the top of the screen on the surface of the water. The subs move across the screen, left or right at various depths below and fire torpedoes upwards and these must be avoided or you lose one of seven lives. As you move and bomb, your fuel decreases and if it reaches zero then you lose a life, but a helicopter flies across the screen dropping barrels to increase your fuel. A timer at the bottom of the screen counts from 0 - 100 and when it reaches 100 you move to the next level.
title: Wolf Pack

description:
3 Konami Coin-Op Hits is a compilation of three games that includes one released game and two unreleased games.

The released game is:

  • Yie Ar Kung-Fu

The two unreleased games are:

  • Hyper Sports
  • Ping Pong
title: 3 Konami Coin-Op Hits

description:
4 Konami Coin-Op Hits is a compilation of four games that includes two released game and two unreleased games.

The two released games are:

  • Green Beret
  • Yie Ar Kung-Fu

The two unreleased games are:

  • Hyper Sports
  • Ping Pong
title: 4 Konami Coin-Op Hits

description:
5 Computer Hits is a collection of five games with four released games and one unreleased game.

The four released game are:

  • Myriad
  • Cavefighter
  • Hyperforce
  • Panik

The unreleased game is:

  • Matrix
title: 5 Computer Hits

description:
6 of the Best is a collection of six games that contains the following games:

  • Terra Nova
  • Out on a Limb
  • Karate King
  • Bridgehead
  • Jump Jet
  • Strip Poker
title: 6 of the Best

description:
C16 Compilation is a collection of four games with three games being released and one game unreleased.

The released games are:

  • DizasterBlaster
  • Pacmania
  • Olympic Skier

The unreleased game is:

Laza!: A single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft in the middle of the screen shooting various coloured squares that move around the outside, left or right. Your craft turns left or right in a 360 degree angle and all the squares that appear have to be shot to move to the next level with the different colours affecting the game. If you miss a square then a grey square appears and if this is shot then it fires back and if you are hit then you lose part of your shield. If the shield is gone then it is game over.
title: C16 Compilation

description:
C16 Star Games Classics is a collection of six games that contains the following:

  • Sword of Destiny
  • Gullwing Falcon
  • Jetbrix
  • Reach for the Sky
  • Dork's Dilemma
  • Xargon's Revenge
title: C16 Star Games Classics

description:
C16 Star Games Classics III is a collection of four games that contains the following:

  • Reach for the Sky
  • Sword of Destiny
  • Gullwing Falcon
  • Jetbrix
title: C16 Star Games Classics III

description:
Favourite 4: Vol 1 is a collection of four games that contains the following:

  • Flight Path 737
  • Moon Buggy
  • Las Vegas
  • Zodiac
title: Favourite 4: Vol 1

description:
Five Star Games is a collection of five games that contains the following:

  • Defence 16
  • Tom Thumb
  • Blagger
  • Pogo Pete
  • Ghost Town
title: Five Star Games

description:
Five Star Games II is a collection of five games that contains the following:

  • Lazerzone
  • Hustler
  • Leapin' Louie
  • Manic Miner
  • Starburst
title: Five Star Games II

description:
Five Star III is a collection of three released games, two unreleased games, plus two free games that contains the following:

The three released games are:

  • Trizons
  • The Way of the Exploding Fist
  • Bubble Trouble

The two unreleased games are:

  • Hellgate
  • Voidrunner

The two free games are:

  • Legionnaire
  • Pin Point
title: Five Star III

description:
Four Great Games is a collection of four games with two released and two unreleased and contains the following:

The released games are:

  • Apollo Rescue
  • Gunslinger

The unreleased games are:

US Drag Racing: A top view scrolling racing game where you attempt to beat various computer controlled cars down a strip of track. As you drive you must watch your rev counter and change up a gear at the right time for maximum acceleration. Each computer controlled car increases in difficulty.

3D Maze: A maze game inspired by Pac-Man but instead of viewing the maze from above, you view it from a 1st person perspective. The aim of the game is to eat all the dots in the maze while avoiding ghosts and if you are caught then you lose one of six lives. In the four corners of the maze are four power-pills and when eaten allow you to eat the ghosts for a short time. Next to the main playing area is a map of the whole maze to help you find your way. There are various mazes and each increase in difficulty and you start with one ghost which increases the further you progress.
title: Four Great Games

description:
Four Great Games: Volume 2 is a collection of four games that contains the following:

  • Jet Set Willy
  • Lawn Tennis
  • World Cup
  • Raffles
title: Four Great Games: Volume 2

description:
Four Great Games: Volume 3 is a collection of four games with three released games and one unreleased game that contains the following:

The released games are:

  • Battlestar
  • Lunar Docking
  • Future Shock

The unreleased game is:

Ack-Ack: A 1st person shooter where the screen scrolls left or right, and up or down when you move a laser sight to destroy bombs fired from unseen aliens. Every time a bomb is fired, an indicator shows you which direction you should move to intercept it and each bomb must be destroyed before it reaches the ground or you lose one of three lives. You must destroy a certain amount within a life to move to the next level and an increase in the number of bombs. Two players can play and each player must wait for the other player to play a full game.
title: Four Great Games: Volume 3

description:
Two Classic Games is a double games pack that contains the following games:

  • Ian Botham's Test Match
  • Jet Set Willy
title: Two Classic Games

description:
Triple Decker 1 is a triple games pack that contains the following games:

  • Invasion Force
  • Tank Attack
  • Winnie the Witch
title: Triple Decker 1

description:
Triple Decker 2 is a triple games pack that contains the following games:

  • Monkey Magic
  • Knockout
  • 3D Quasars
title: Triple Decker 2

description:
Triple Decker 3 is a triple games pack that contains the following games:

  • Galaxions
  • Mission Mars
  • Quick Draw
title: Triple Decker 3

description:
Triple Decker 4 is a triple games pack that contains the following games:

  • Space Freeks
  • Suicide Run
  • Meteorites
title: Triple Decker 4

description:
Triple Decker 5 is a triple games pack that contains the following games:

  • Robin to the Rescue
  • Cruncher
  • Alien Attack
title: Triple Decker 5

description: Suicide Run is a side view horizontal shooter where the screen scrolls left to right constantly, and your aim is to fly over the surface of Mars moving your spacecraft up or down. As you fly, you will encounter missiles flying upwards as well as asteroids sitting still in the sky and these must be shot or avoided. If you are hit by anything as well as hitting the surface of Mars then you lose one of three lives. You are able to shoot forwards as well as bomb and there are fuel dumps that can be destroyed for extra points.
title: Suicide Run

description:
Triple Decker 6 is a triple games pack that contains two released games and one unreleased game:

The released games are:

  • Tazz
  • Trizons

The unreleased game is:

Panzer Duel: A top view single screen shooter where you control a tank in four directions and you must destroy another tank on the screen over various levels. As you move around the screen, you must shoot the other tank while avoiding his weapon, and you have to hit the other tank three times before you are hit three times to move to the next level. On screen as well, is a gun firing constantly which needs avoiding and later levels has walls and small squares with an arrow, and if hit your weapon goes in the direction it is pointing.

sample_screenshots.caption: Panzer Duel: Destroy the other tank

title: Triple Decker 6

description:
Triple Decker 7 is a triple games that contains two released games and one unreleased game:

The two released games are:

  • Trail Blazer
  • Jetbrix

The unreleased game is:

Laza!: A single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft in the middle of the screen shooting various coloured squares that move around the outside, left or right. Your craft turns left or right in a 360 degree angle and all the squares that appear have to be shot to move to the next level with the different colours affecting the game. If you miss a square then a grey square appears and if this is shot then it fires back and if you are hit then you lose part of your shield. If the shield is gone then it is game over.

sample_screenshots.caption: Laza!: Don't shoot the grey square

title: Triple Decker 7

description: Control Command is a top view single screen shooter where you must protect your space station from attack by alien forces. Your space station is represented by a rectangle in the middle of the screen and on each side is a gun which fires outwards. Moving up or down controls the guns on the vertical sides of the rectangle while moving left or right controls the guns on the horizontal sides of the rectangle. The aliens move around the outside of the screen in various formations and these need blasting for as long as possible. Occasionally an alien will break off from it's formation and attempt to hit your guns and if a gun is hit then it is the loss of one of three lives. You are also equipped with three smart bombs and when used destroys everything on the screen.
title: Control Command

description:
The Action Pack is a collection of six games that contains the following games:

  • Raider
  • Sea Strike
  • Megazap
  • Mail Trail
  • Zone Control
  • Control Command
title: The Action Pack

description:
Syndrome + Tank Block & Blast It is a triple games pack that contains three unreleased games:

Syndrome: A top view vertical scrolling game where the screen scrolls upwards constantly over three sectors. You control a Syndrome in an attempt to make an atom by avoiding various objects and collecting other items like energy cells. As you progress your Syndrome gets longer and if you hit the sides or an object then it is game over.

Tank Block: A top view single screen game where you control a tank and you must stop missiles that appear from the right of the screen and stop them hitting the left side. To stop them you just hit the missile with your tank and if a missile hits the left side of the screen then it is game over.

Blast It: A side view single screen shooter where you control a laser base on the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, and shoot down alien pods that appear from the top of the screen. You must stop them landing on the surface as they will build up and if you are touched by a pod either in the air or on the surface then it is game over.
title: Syndrome + Tank Block & Blast It

description:
Super Hits from microdeal is a collection of six games that contains the following games:

  • Cuthbert in the Cooler
  • Castle Dracula: Adventure 5
  • Cuthbert in Space
  • Arena 3000
  • Cuthbert Enters the Tombs Of Doom
  • Ultimate: Adventure 4
title: Super Hits from microdeal

description:
Space Sweep & Invaders is a double games pack that contains the following games:

Space Sweep: You are a Space Sweeper called Alpha-Man whose job it is to destroy all the spy satellites in your Galaxy placed by Leutitians. The game is a side view horizontal scrolling shooter where the screen scrolls left or right constantly when you move, but you are able to scroll the screen up or down. You must shoot all the satellites while avoiding various objects that are either static or move around the screen and if you hit one then you lose one of five lives. As you fly and shoot, a fuel gauge decreases and when it reaches the red part then you must re-fuel by docking with your Mothership which appears when you are low on fuel.

Invaders: A side view single screen shooter based on Space Invaders where you control a craft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, to blast aliens in formation above who are dropping bombs. The aliens move across the screen to the right and when they hit the side of the screen then they drop down one place and move to the left. Between you and the aliens are four shields which protect you from the bombs but will start to disappear from the bombs and your shots. If you are hit by a bomb or allow the aliens to land then you lose one of three lives. A Mothership occasionally moves across the top of the screen and if shot gives you bonus points. There are 9 skill levels (1-9) with one being the easiest.
title: Space Sweep & Invaders

description:
Sextett is a collection of six games with five released games and one unreleased game:

The released games are:

  • Karate King
  • Terra Nova
  • Strip Poker
  • Out on a Limb
  • Jump Jet

The unreleased game is:

Alien Invasion: A clone of the game Bridgehead where you are a soldier viewed from the side who has to run from left to right over various levels with the screen scrolling as you move. Your mission is to kill the alien invaders by killing them with your knife and you can reach higher parts of the levels by climbing ladders. There are also mines that need avoiding and to get rid of them you can use a limited amount of grenades, but more can be collected. If you touch an alien or mine then you lose one of six lives.
title: Sextett

description:
Sandcastles and Paramaths is a double educational games pack aimed at children between 5 - 11 years old with the following two games to improve their maths skills for two players:

Sandcastles: The aim is to answer questions on either addition or multiplication to build a sandcastle before the other player. There are nine difficulty levels to choose from (1-9) with one being the easiest, and as one player receives a question to answer, the other player's sandcastle is being built. Once the player gets the question right then the other player's sandcastle stops being built and now has to answer a question while the other sandcastle gets bigger.

Paramaths: A plane is flying over the sea and gets shot down, causing a maths question to parachute out of the plane and float towards the sea. A player has to answer the question before it hits the water and when answered correctly the other player has to watch his plane being shot before answering the question that appears. The are two difficulty levels (easy or hard).
title: Sandcastles and Paramaths

description:
Power Pack: Volume 1 is a collection of four games that contains the following:

  • Tomb of Tarrabash
  • Kaktus
  • Leapin' Louie
  • Chip Factory
title: Power Pack: Volume 1

description:
Plus-Paket 16 is a collection of four games that contains the following:

  • Grandmaster
  • Tom
  • Galaxy
  • Ghost Town
title: Plus-Paket 16

description:
Omnibus is a collection of ten games that contains eight released games and two unreleased games:

The released games are:

  • Future Knight
  • Jetbrix
  • Project Nova
  • Trailblazer
  • Rescue from Zylon
  • Xargon Wars
  • Tycoon Tex
  • Footballer of the Year

The unreleased games are:

  • Bounder
  • Planet Search
title: Omnibus

description:
Omnibus II is a collection of ten games that contains the following:

  • Dorks Dilemma
  • Xcellor 8
  • Kung Fu Kid
  • Magician's Curse
  • Reach for the Sky
  • Monty on the Run
  • Sword of Destiny
  • Wimbledon
  • Xargon's Revenge
  • Petals of Doom
title: Omnibus II

description:
Mindbenders is a collection of eight games to get the brain-cells working with puzzle, strategy and action games:

Repeat After Me: A memory game where you have to match the sequence the computer shows you by pressing buttons. You start with just one button pressed and if correct the computer then presses the same button and then another one. Every time you get the sequence correct the computer adds another button until you get the sequence wrong.

Jeff's Panel: You are presented with an 8 x 8 grid full of four different coloured squares in a formation. You let the computer know how many times to scramble the formation before you then have to put the squares back in their correct order. You are only allowed to slide a whole row or column to move any square.

Rotation: You are presented with a 4 x 4 grid with each square having a letter inside. You must move the letters around to put the them in order. When you select a letter to move it will rotate with four other letters in a clockwise direction. You cannot select a letter on the edge of the grid and you have one special move where you can swap two letters

Blackjack: A casino card game where you have to beat the dealer to win money by getting 21 or as close to without going over. You have two cards and you must decide whether to keep them or to receive another card. Once you are happy with your total or you go over 21 (Bust) the dealer plays. Two players can play the computer and both start with $1000 and you have the choice of how many decks to play with (1-6).

Labyrinth: A 1st person perspective game where you have to get to an exit in a 3D maze. You first can select the size of the maze before seeing a map of the maze. As you wander the maze, you can select the map but the aim is to escape without using the map.

Letter Slider: You are presented with a 3 x 3 grid full of squares with letters inside and one blank square. You must move the letters around the grid to put them in order using the blank square to put a letter in.

Magic Square: You are presented with a 3 x 3 grid with squares with a number inside and you have to highlight all the squares leaving square 5 in the middle blank. Pressing a number highlights certain squares and you keep pressing numbers to highlight the squares.

Word Search: You input up to 20 words before trying to find the words in a 20 x 20 grid full of letters. The words can be horizontal, vertical, diagonal and backwards.

sample_screenshots.caption: Repeat After Me: Memorise the sequence

title: Mindbenders

description:
Lone Survivor / Wacky Painter is a double games pack that contains two unreleased games:

Lone Survivor: A text adventure where you are the only survivor of a nuclear holocaust and your aim is to try to survive on a day to day existence. The screen has text describing your current location and you type in commands with the keyboard to interact with your surroundings.

Wacky Painter: A single screen game where you control a brush and you have to paint all the squares in a 5 x 4 grid over various levels. To paint a square you must paint all four lines of each square to fill it and while you paint you must avoid creatures moving around the maze. If you touch a creature then you lose a life. Before the start of the game, you can select one of the first three levels and how many lives (1-4).

sample_screenshots.caption: Lone Survivor: In a storage room
Lone Survivor: In a strange bed

title: Lone Survivor / Wacky Painter

description:
Liberator / Space Fiends is a double games pack that contains the following games:

  • Liberator
  • Space Fiends
title: Liberator / Space Fiends

description:
CSJ Games 1 is a triple games pack containing three unreleased games:

Sun Street (The Newsboy): An isometric scrolling game, inspired by Paperboy where you are a newspaper delivery boy and you must deliver newspapers to all the houses by throwing them as you pass. As you ride your bike there are various obstacles to avoid like dustbins, cats, pedestrians and cars and if you hit any obstacle then you lose one of three lives.

Danger Diamonds: A single screen game inspired by Boulder dash where you must move around the screen collecting a certain amount of diamonds while avoiding various obstacles. As you move, you dig through dirt and if you pass under a boulder or other objects then they fall when you pass. If you are crushed by any object or touch certain objects then you lose one of three lives.

The Jolly Good Fellow: A single screen platform game where you are a ghost and you have to collect fruit over various levels. As you collect fruit, you can jump up and stand on the bottom of a platform above but you can't move left or right. There are various creatures moving around the screen and if you touch one then you lose one of four lives. To get to higher platforms you can use moving ropes or lifts.

sample_screenshots.caption: The Jolly Good Fellow: Collect the fruit

title: CSJ Games 1

description:
HJD Games is a collection of eight games that contains the following:

Invasion: A single screen side view shooter inspired by Space Invaders where you control a spacecraft, moving left or right, at the bottom of the screen, blasting aliens in formation above. The aliens move from left to right and when they reach the right side of the screen, they move left but one place lower. As you blast the aliens they drop bombs and if you are hit by a bomb or allow them to land then you lose one of four lives. Between you and the aliens are six shields to protect you from the bombs but these start to disappear when hit from you and the aliens. Occasionally a Mothership flies from left to right across the top of the screen and when shot gives you bonus points.

Firelab: A top view single screen maze game where you must move around the maze blasting and avoiding the aliens that move around the maze. If you touch an alien then you lose one of three lives and when all aliens are gone, you move to the next level.

Xelien: A side view single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, blasting aliens that move around the screen. Below your craft are seven humans and you must stop certain aliens from picking up the humans and taking them away. If you are shot, touched by an alien, or lose all the humans then you lose one of three lives. Destroy all the aliens on screen and you move to the next level.

Zonex: A single screen shooter where you control two spacecrafts, one on the bottom of the screen and one on the right side of the screen and you can only move one craft at a time. You must blast all the aliens on the screen and if you are shot or touch an alien then you lose one of four lives. Destroy all the aliens on the screen and you move to the next level.

Droid: A single screen top view shooter where you must destroy all the droids on the screen to move to the next level. Control of your spacecraft has you turning in a 360 degree angle, left or right, and you press up to move forward. If you are hit by a droid then you lose one of four lives.

Jailbreak: A single screen side view shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, and you must stop six balls from escaping. In the middle of the screen is a rectangle with six balls walled in and aliens move from the sides of the screen to destroy the wall. When an alien hits the wall, it removes part of it and then the alien moves back across the screen. Once a gap appears in the wall, the balls can escape and bounce around the screen. The aliens helping in the escape drop bombs while you blast them and if you are hit by an alien or ball then you lose one of three lives. As in Space Invaders there are shields between you and the aliens to protect you from their bombs but the shields start to disappear when hit from you or the aliens.

Maniac: A single screen top view shooter inspired by the game Centipede where you control a spacecraft on the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, trying to destroy a centipede type creature that moves across the screen moving downwards. As you blast the centipede, it will break into two every time you hit it and the centipede will also change direction when it hits one of many mushrooms on the screen. The mushrooms can be shot for points and various creatures appear on screen and need shooting as well. If you are hit by any creature then you lose one of three lives.

Ghost-Hunt: A side view single screen shooter where you have to destroy all the ghosts on the screen by shooting a ball which you can only shoot one at a time. When you move, you dig through dirt and make a path and the ghosts need releasing from a huge hole before you can destroy them all. If you are hit by a ghost then it is game over.
title: HJD Games

description: Kőműves Kelemen is an early Tetris variant that features a masonry theme where the tetrominoes are meant to represent bricks. Other than that the gameplay is almost identical to the original game. As the bricks fall from the top of the screen the player can move them left or right and rotate them. For each line cleared the player earns points and the game goes on until the bricks reaches the top of the screen. The aim is simply to get the highest score possible and reach a high position in the high score chart. Before starting out it's possible to choose the speed of the game (0-9) but unlike the original Tetris the speed is constant and doesn't increase as the game goes on.
title: Kőműves Kelemen

description: Eoroid Professional is a puzzle solving game, played on a 18x9 board. The main goal requires removing all the blocks from the board within limited numbers of moves. By clicking on a single spot, the player affects all the fields around by their reversal, including the chosen one - filled block disappears and a blank spot is replaced with filled block. Basically, each taken action reverses simultaneously 9 fields, one in the middle, and 8 around (3x3 square).
title: Eoroid Professional

description:
A whimsical Mario-style game. You are a boy called Jerry and you are on a quest for some magical crystals. The crystals have to be collected, along with all the fruits you encounter.

After collecting everything, you have to go to the rightmost edge of the level to advance to the next one. The wildlife is hostile to Jerry so has to be avoided. Picking up toadstools is bad too - you lose 10 seconds from the time limit. Purple blocks reveal hidden fruit when bumped from below.

In some places you can dig into the ground, or push rocks out of your way. The levels scroll both horizontally and vertically, and on the bottom of the screen, messages pop up related to your actions.
title: Jerry's Quest

description: A puzzle-solving platformer game where you have to collect all the yellow keys to open up the exit to the next level. But what is Mr Angry Dude so angry about? You discover it as soon as you start playing: all the blocks, unfriendly creatures, and keys, that are in the same row as you, are pushed or pulled into the direction you are moving, regardless how far away they are. There is a strict time limit that expands a little when you collect a key. You also have the ability to materialize or dissolve a limited amount of yellow boxes. Further annoyance is, yellow objects cannot be pushed off the side of the screen (so they would roll over to the other side), instead, they push you back. Get ready to be infuriated!
title: Mr Angry Dude

description:
Dave is a dork and he has to save the stupid princess. You manage Dave through the scrolling levels and assorted platforms by going mostly right, sometimes left, or jumping when it is appropriate. Collecting the pills on the way is advisable.

Hazards include tiny killer boxes running back and forth, timed lszer walls, dissolving blocks, and falling through the bottom of the level.
title: Dork Dave and The Dirty Trick

description: A static screen platform game. Our hero is a small unnamed yellow creature. During his stroll in the forest, he finds a cool time machine, and so the adventure begins. You have to navigate him through an assortment of dangerous creatures to the end of the levels.

sample_screenshots.caption: "You can cause a time paradox that could start a chain reaction that could DESTROY THE ENTIRE UNIVERSE!"

title: Adventures in Time

description:
Majesty of Sprites is a sidescrolling platformer game more or less comparable to The Great Giana Sisters. Kate enters into a gigantic world of platforms, jumps, foes and fairies within an enchanted book to find her lost sister Clara.

In the first part, the game has flick scrolling. There are 6 worlds with different themes, all split into 2 levels. A certain amount of hearts has to be sought out and collected in order to complete the levels.

If you reach the exit at the end of a level without the required amount of hearts, you have to restart it from the beginning! These hearts also serve as extra lives. You also have a health bar. Balls can be collected to throw at unfriendly creatures. Checkpoints are in the middle of the levels.

For a bonus, there is a second part added to the game more recently - 3 huge free-roaming levels with multi-directional scrolling. The two parts are separate and are selectable from a menu.

The game itself is freeware, but physical disk with artwork and packaging can be ordered from Psytronik.

sample_screenshots.caption: Start of level 1 in the first chapter

title: Majesty of Sprites

description:
A followup platform game to to Majesty of Sprites. Kate once again descends into the realm of the magical book, this time to save it. She has to return the last spellstone to the Gate of Andorow to restore piece.

The game is a sidescrolling platformer, somewhat comparable to The Great Giana Sisters. New features include a level password system, difficulty settings, and a refined scrolling engine.

The game is freeware, but physical disk with artwork and packaging can be ordered from Psytronik.
title: The Lands of Zador

description:
Time Labyrinth is a maze game. You are trapped in a weird place and your health is continually degrading as time passes, so you must navigate out of there quickly! Pressing the S key reveals the map but you lose health for it. The key has to be retrieved to open the exit.

However, there is a time storm in the labyrinth that puts you into random situations at random points of the time-space continuum! Characters, creatures, and things pcreate a challenge for you.

These challenges are usually related to letters and words. If you beat the test you are left unharmed. Watch out for Aristoteles as he is the keyholder. Once you are at the exit, you have to give a password that is hinted about during play.
title: Időlabirintus

description:
Out of the myriad unofficial versions of Tetris, this one is influenced by the Mirrorsoft version of Tetris on the Commodore 64. A fast paced music with digitized drum sample plays in-game.

As usual, differently arranged 4-tile pieces (one at a time) are slowly falling into a pit, and you have to manage them around until they reach a stationary state at the bottom of the free space. When the tiles constitute complete rows, those rows disappear and you get points for it.

If there are gaps in the rows, the pieces pile up, and the game ends if the pile reaches the top of the pit. There is a window that shows you the following piece. You can move the pieces horizontally, rotate them, or drop them down immediately.
title: Tetris

description:
A Hungarian text adventure game, inspired by Fazekas on the Commodore 64.

You play as a student of the Karinthy Frigyes high school. You have lost your lunch ticket, and the secretary is only willing to give you another one if you bring her a magazine. And so the humorous quest for lunch begins.

The parser works with keywords. You can select a keyword by pressing its associated hotkey.
title: Karinthy Adventure

description: Autobahn is a car racing game. Keyboard or joystick control as well as track B, A and E can be chosen at the beginning. You can drive over 170 on a very wide street. The faster you drive, the farther to the left on the screen you are. Avoiding hitting other cars gets more difficult that way. The most important utility at your disposal is the very small radar screen at the top of the screen. Most of the time you spend looking at the radar to see when cars are about to hit you, so you can slow down and avoid them.
title: Autobahn

description: A bomber flies from left to right. When the bomber leaves the right end of the screen, it will appear again on the left side, but one level deeper. You have five bombs available on each flyby, which are released by pressing space. Make sure to bomb the highest structures first, so you will not crash into them. One crash and it is game over.

sample_screenshots.caption: Crashed into one of the structures

title: Bombázó

description: Star Events is a typical sports collection of the time. Hypersports, Decathlon and others work the same way. You have to wriggle the joystick from left to right and press the button at the right time to jump over hurdles, make a far jump and others.
title: Daley Thompson's Star Events

description: Hidra is a game of life type of game. You place several kinds or organism on the playfield and let nature take its cause by advancing the cycles. Some organisms will die out, others will form small colonies.

sample_screenshots.caption: After several cycles, all that is left are some stable colonies

title: Hidra

description: Legyőzhetetlen is a platform game. You jump on elevators and run away from the enemies who are constantly chasing you. If you are in the perfect vertical position you can even try to shoot an enemy.
title: Legyőzhetetlen

description: Joe and the Seriff is a Hungarian game for two players set in a western town. A guy called Joe tries to steal chickens and bring them home. The other player is the sheriff and tries to shoot Joe before he can bring the chickens home. But Joe can shoot too. The sheriff has unlimited lives and the game is over when Joe loses his four lives. There are bonus points for Joe every fourth time he manages to kill the sheriff. Their revolvers can hold six bullets and can be reloaded one by one by pressing a key.

sample_screenshots.caption: Joe already took some chickens, now the sheriff tries to get behind him.

title: Joe and the Serif

description: Legende im Eis is a German graphic adventure game. Your task is to find a lost red ruby.

sample_screenshots.caption: The second room with the chair

title: Legende im Eis

description: Lemuria is a German graphic adventure. You are in Lemuria, a continent forever lost. An old magic mirror brought you there. Now you have to find that mirror again to be able to return home. You will need three keys to fulfill your quest. They are guarded by an evil sorcerer, a dragon and the gnomes.
title: Lemuria

description: Operation Hawaii is a german text adventure game with graphics. You play the role of a private investigator and your case is to find the famous ethnologist C.D.Allen. As usual in text adventures you type in the commands for the character to do, like look at something or take something. Only here everything is in german.
title: Operation Hawaii

description: A-07 is a clone on Mission Impossible. Direct connection man - computer (Ethanak 500) has failed. The player (Mike Yerrow) needs to destroy the machine within 45 minutes. In order to fulfill the task disks scattered around the base must be found, while avoiding numerous mechanical obstacles. Ethanak may be used as a helper after discovering the login password, as far as proper information is delivered.
title: A-07

description: In Black Thunder the player controls a battle copter, equipped with rockets and bombs. The task requires getting through the enemy area, full of hostile of planes and ships. The pilot may change the high and the speed of the copter, fill up the ammunition and fuel supply. Any contact with a hostile object means a certain death.
title: Black Thunder

description: Boogie-Woogie Spiders is a Pac-Man clone. The player must eat all the dots on the board, while avoiding constantly moving spiders. Unlike the original, there are no big dots used to neutralize opponents. All the other rules remain unchanged.
title: Boogie-Woogie Spiders

description: Kazik and the Ghosts is an arcade game, where the player must find the way out of the maze, while avoiding ghosts, hostile animals and deadly obstacles. All the hostile creatures may be killed with pistol. Contact with enemies and obstacles means a loss of energy, which may be supplemented, same as the ammo number.
title: Kazik and the Ghosts

description: Lift 16 is a first person perspective adventure game, played inside a multi-level base. Moving to a higher level requires finding a lift. Each level is divided into numerous rooms. Moving course is described by geographical direction on the map.
title: Lift 16

description: Kazik i Mumia is a timed single screen arcade game. The task of the player is to find a key to the next stage before the time runs out, while avoiding a mummy.
