The key is hidden in one of 18 chests. Opening them requires "touching" each of four corners of it. Some of the chests may contain high scoring items.
title: Kazik i Mumia

description: Music Maze is a game based on Musikalisches Labyrinth. The player's task is getting out of the labyrinth before the time runs out, by finding a treasure inside a maze and returning back to the entry point while music plays. The remaining time gives extra points.
title: Music Maze

description: In Phoenix the player takes the role of a fighter pilot, struggling with numerous enemy planes, To hit the enemies, the fighter has to be at the correct height. The ammo is unlimited, each contact with an enemy missile destroys the machine. The fighter may be moved into the left and right and change the height level.
title: Phoenix

description: Zamek is an arcade game, where the player must defend the city walls from Tatars invasion. The game requires moving on the wall and dropping stones on the soldiers climbing on the ladders. The score depends on the soldier height. The game ends if any of the invaders reach the top of the wall.
title: Zamek

description: Way by Numbers is a single screen logic game. The goal of the player is to gain as many points as possible within 25 moves. The game starts from selecting the start position and requires moving one field in any direction. The number of already received points and remaining steps is shown on the right panel. There is no time limit.
title: Way by Numbers

description: Tapper is a clone of it's famous namesake, where the player as a barman has to serve beer to demanding customers. There are four rows of customers, all moving constantly to the beer distributor. Reaching the end of the lane without receiving their beer by any of the customers, costs one life. Similarly - not catching an empty glass and breaking a full glass on the wall.
title: Tapper

description: Otello is a computer conversion of the popular two players board game Reversi (also known as Othello). The player competes against computer on an 8x8 board. The aim is to fill the board with as many own pawns as possible by flanking computer's pawns (vertically, horizontally or diagonally) to capture them and reverse their symbols.
title: Otello

description: Uranus is a sci-fi shooter, where the player as a space fighter pilot must destroy as many balls coming from the top of the screen as possible, while avoiding collision with them. The ball is moving in various directions, requiring to predict the position at the moment of contact with the rockets. The score summary shows missing and shot down objects.
title: Uranus

description:
Spekulant is a simple trade game, which consists of illegally buying and selling 8 kinds of goods in 8 Polish cities. Players can buy and sell goods, borrow money and travel to other cities. In addiction in one city (Katowice) a smuggled items may be purchased. Travelling is done by train, although there is possibility to buy an own car.

The game is played in a text mode, there are no graphic elements.
title: Spekulant

description:
Życie Maklera is a text based economic game. As a mine owner the player must keep as long as possible owned assets. The player may trade mines, sell ore and pay miners wages. Each mine requires ten employed miners. Miners payment affects the level of life and therefore the size of ore extraction. Every year the price of mine, ore and food is changing. Proper use of price trends is the key to wealth multiplication.

Życie Maklera is an unofficial port of C64 game of the same title.
title: Życie Maklera

description: Szejk is a text based board game for 2 up to 4 players. Each player chooses the oil field on which he will drill. Successful drill gives a point. Finding oil in the field adjacent to the shaft gives bonus points. The chance of finding oil depends on the number of drills and the number of oil wells nearby.
title: Szejk

description: Gra sadystyczna: Lej is a text-based sadistic game to recover from a bad morning. The game is all about mistreating the victim in one of the available methods: dropping from the mountain of water or shooting to escaping person. The first one involves in addiction throwing the rocks by selecting an angle and strength of the throw. The second one is in fact a cushion, as weapon possession is illegal and selecting this king of tortures finishes the game.
title: Gra sadystyczna: Lej

description: Gra decyzyjna: Królestwo is a text-based Hammurabi variant. The task requires ruling the kingdom as long as possible. In order to reach the goal, the player must control the population by proper use of land, grain, labor and money. Each turn finishes with a year summary, showing crop harvest, the impact of random events on the kingdom, changes in the population number and general contentment.
title: Gra decyzyjna: Królestwo

description: Mastermind ia a text-based daptation of the eponymous board game. The objective of the game is to guess a combination of 1 up to 6 digitswithin the allowed number of trials. After each trial computer shows how many digitswere indicated right and how many appears in combination, but in a different position.
title: Mastermind

description: Castle Dance is a platform game. The player's goal is to find an item hidden in a locked chamber. In order to get to it, it is necessary to travel through the castle full of ghosts, find the key and use it in the mechanism that opens the passage.
title: Castle Dance

description: Burglar is a platform game, similar to Montezuma's Revenge. The player moves through a castle full of enemies, platforms and various obstacles in search of items that will allow him to get outside.
title: Burglar

description: Samolot is a simple arcade game. The player is a fighter pilot who flies from the left to the right side of the screen at a constant speed. His task is to drop bombs on the hearts below. If you don't hit all the targets within three passes, you lose the game.
title: Samolot

description: Kosmiczne Śmieci is a simplified version of Space Invaders. The player's task is to destroy the alien spaceship falling to the bottom of the screen. A missed shot causes the ship to remain on the map where it was when it was shot. If the enemy reaches the ground, the game is over.
title: Kosmiczne Śmieci

description: Labirynt is a simple game, where the player's goal is to find items and get out of the maze. The entire labyrinth consists of 99 chambers.
title: Labirynt

description: Novag is single screen game. The player's task is to collect all the treasure while avoiding contact with the walls and obstacles. After grabbing all items the player must reach the spaceship before the time runs out.
title: Novag

description: Fast is a simple space shooter. The player's task is to shoot down enemies in high orbit. He scores 1000 points for each hit. Enemies in low orbit make the mission difficult, and hitting them is only worth 10 points.
title: Fast

description: Jumper is single screen game. The player's task is to collect all the treasure while avoiding contact with the fire obstacles. After grabbing all items the player must reach the entry spot.
title: Jumper

description: Commando for Commodore 16 is a very loose adaptation of Capcom's arcade game. It consists of five non-scrolling screens of action based on locales from the original game: there are enemies in fox holes in areas one, two and three, bridges to cross in areas two and three, enemies on an open field in area four, and an enemy fortress in area five. There are two kinds of enemies, either sporting guns or rocket launchers, though they only fire either straightly or diagonally downward. All enemies in an area must be destroyed to get to the next. Once all five are cleared, the game restarts from the beginning. Unlike in the original arcade game, the player's soldier can only shoot and not throw grenades.
title: Commando
